Description:
Bachelor's degree in business, human resources, or related field
At least 5 years of experience in HR operations support, including 2 years of supervisory experience
Demonstrated experience with HRIS systems, ideally Workday or comparable software
Ability to manage multiple priorities, meet deadlines, and effectively balance workload
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with an ability to influence and negotiate
Attention to detail, high level of accuracy, and ability to maintain confidentiality
Knowledge of HR-related laws and regulations, including FMLA, ADA, and FLSA.Job Details
